abstract: European regulators are bringing antitrust charges against Intel, the world’s biggest chip maker, accusing the company of using illegal rebates in its fight against Advanced Micro Devices.
lead_paragraph: European regulators are bringing antitrust charges against Intel, the world’s biggest chip maker, accusing the company of using illegal rebates in its fight against Advanced Micro Devices.

headline.main: Regulators in Europe Accuse Intel of Violating Antitrust Laws
